channel.title: Need help with Quest History please!
channel.description:
How to add Server history to Quest history??
Ima explain more: Like if admins/mods do ::say the message just dissapear, from the chat bar... I want it to save in Quest History button? How to add it in the quest history?? In what file etc, and would be better if you tell me what code im going to put in there:)

item.title: Need help with Quest History please!
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

what file? comandhandle.java thers ur file. build an history saver in it.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with Quest History please!
